nodes.text: The Burnsi Run was a hyperspace route that led in the direction of the planet Midarr. On the planet Dol'har Hyde—while investigating the site where a Nihil Path engine was found and sold to Beol De'Rruyet of De'Rruyet Industries, who planned to unveil the technology at an expo on Midarr—the rogue archaeologist Doctor Chelli Aphra suggested taking the Burnsi Run to the smuggler Sana Starros. Starros, however, insisted that she had no interest in accompanying Aphra to Midarr.
